overview: Yuki Itose is just a typical student dealing with the pressures of college. She is struggling one day on the train when an upperclassman named Itsuomi Nagi helps her out. As he gradually opens a new world to her, Yuki develops feelings for Itsuomi. A pure love story begins to grow.

1.episodeOverview: Yuki, who was born in a world where sounds don't sound like anything, runs into the enigmatic Itsuomi and immediately takes an interest in him.
Yuki tries to come to terms with her newfound feelings for Itsuomi, while Oushi offers a glimpse into what he's been trying to come to terms with for a long time.
Having come to terms with her feelings for Itsuomi, Yuki prepares to make her move, but she encounters a sight that throws her into confusion and doubt.
Having made plans with Kyouya to go shopping, Rin invites Yuki and Itsuomi to join them.
Itsuomi and Yuki have a chat at his place, and several lingering questions are answered.

1.episodeTitle: I Thought I Wanted to Keep Watching Her Forever
1.episodeOverview: Yuki and Kyouya each urge Itsuomi to make himself clear on where he stands in his relationship with Yuki, and he surprises them with his answer.

1.fileName: S01E07-Let Me Introduce You to My Girlfriend [0CF3C03C].mkv
1.episodeTitle: Let Me Introduce You to My Girlfriend
1.episodeOverview: Itsuomi is away on his trip, and Yuki is left trying to come to grips with their new reality.
Being introduced to Yuki gets Shin reminiscing about his high school days with Itsuomi and Emma.
The gang heads up the mountains for a very eventful boot camp.
Itsuomi knows that a confrontation with Oushi is inevitable and decides to take matters into his own hands.
Yuki faces her nerves before an interview for her part-time job, and Shin has to battle his to finally break the news to Emma.
Yuki and Itsuomi have their first date as a couple, and it leads to them learning more about each other.
